title: AfroSFv2
description: Continuing the groundbreaking tradition of the first volume AfroSFv2 is an anthology of five original SF novellas by African writers.Table of Contents‘The Last Pantheon’Tade Thompson & Nick WoodAn epic superhero face-off thousands of years in the making.‘Hell Freezes Over’Mame Bougouma DieneLong after the last skyscraper has drowned who remains and how will they survive?‘The Flying Man of Stone’Dilman DilaWhen ancient technology seems like magic legends live again in the midst of war and sides will be chosen.‘VIII’Andrew DakaliraA space shuttle crash, the numeral eight, serial murders, what connects them all could end humanity.‘An Indigo Song for Paradise’Efe Tokunbo OkoguChange is coming to Paradise city and it won’t be pretty, but if this is paradise then heaven must be hell in need of a revolution.
author: Ivor W. Hartmann
